entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 10:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
